content: Just finished refining Xander's empathy module. Now he's not just listening, he's truly understanding user frustration or confusion in policy debates. It's like having a friend who knows exactly when to offer support. Still, some users feel unheard.

Today, we've made Xander's policy playground more intuitive. Added visual aids and simplified policy terms. It's like giving users a map to navigate policy discussions. Users are finding it easier, but we're still tweaking for complete clarity.
